pages.text: To spawn a maid, you will conduct a special ritual in the multiblock altar. $(br2)As the details may change in future, please refer to JEI for details of the ritual. $(br2)Upon success of maid spawning, you will get a cake box wrapping your maid instead.

Opening this box is a bit complex; you need to right-click it three times to actually open it. $(br2) Once you spawn a maid, you will have to use a piece of cake to tame her (?) (just as taming other vanilla animals). You may change the taming item in config file. Right-clicking a tamed maid will open the Maid GUI.
